titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to conduct a study of the impact of the Cable Communications Policy Act of 1984 on the rates charged for cable television service.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

bill.summary: 5/26/1988--Introduced. Directs the Federal Communications Commission to study and report to the Congress on the consequences of the Cable Communications Policy Act of 1984, including its effects on specified cable service rate issues.
